skills.name: Waterless Dance of the Shattered Maelstrom

levels.effect: Binds a faraway target and generates a tornado centered on it, inflicting -50% Movement Speed to nearby enemies. Enemies caught in the tornado receive 70% ATK as Arts damage and are dragged towards the center slightly once every 1.5 seconds. The target and nearby enemies are dragged towards this unit slightly after the skill duration

elite_levels.description: When deployed, all [Abyssal Hunter] Operators recover 1.5% of Max HP per second and receive 15% less Physical and Arts damage from [Seaborn] enemies
When deployed, all [Abyssal Hunters] Operators recover 2.5% of Max HP per second and receive 25% less Physical and Arts damage from [Seaborn] enemies
When attacking enemies with 3 or less weight, increase ATK to 130%

potential_upgrades.description: When attacking enemies with 3 or less weight, increase ATK to 136% (+6%)
